Custom Event/Messaging system

// notifydo
// ondo.js
```
function Hoang(parent) {
	var listeners = [];
	this.do = function(callback) {
		listeners.push(callback);
	};
	this.undo = function(callback) {
		listeners.splice(listeners.indexOf(callback), 1);
	};
	this.notify = function() {
		for (var v = 0; v<listeners.length; v++) {
			listeners[v].apply(parent, arguments);
		}
	};
}
```

```
function Cat() {
	this.name = 'cat';
	this.onSay = new Hoang(this);
}

Cat.prototype.says = function(something) {
	this.onSay.notify(something);
}

cat = new Cat();

cat.onSay.do(function(something) {
	console.log(this.name + ' said ' + something)
})
```

cat.says('meow')
